pullRequest.title: [NETBEANS-4294] Donation of original AutoSave module to Apache NetBeans
pullRequest.bodyText: The first PR for the AutoSave module donation. Please, let me know any issue it has to be fixed asap. Thank you in advance.

commit.message: [NETBEANS-4294] Donation of original AutoSave module to Apache NetBeans

nodes.bodyText: License header is missing.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,109 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>
+

commit.message: [NETBEANS-4294] Fixed incorrect option section name in module description
[NETBEANS-4294] Fixed module versioning and added autosave module as editor.kit dependency as well nbbuild/cluster.properties build pipeline
[NETBEANS-4294] Included license information for form file

nodes.bodyText: Is this module loaded (and this installer run) only when the autosave functionality is actually enabled?
nodes.diffHunk:

nodes.bodyText: Is this the right way to add a weak listener? Shouldn't we use WeakListener interface? Or wouldn't it be better to explicitly remove the listener when the module is removed?

nodes.bodyText: This module seems to use a different internationalization system than the rest of the IDE. It would be better to use the standard NetBeans libraries for this.
nodes.diffHunk:

+  <project version="1.0">
+    <source_dir>__DEFAULT__</source_dir>
+    <target_dir>__DEFAULT__</target_dir>
+    <tm_dir>__DEFAULT__</tm_dir>
+    <glossary_dir>__DEFAULT__</glossary_dir>
+    <source_lang>EN-US</source_lang>
+    <target_lang>PT-BR</target_lang>
+    <sentence_seg>true</sentence_seg>
+  </project>

nodes.bodyText: Wait... this just creates a WeakReference instance wrapping the listener, gets the listener, and then immediately throws away the WeakReference?
Just a question org.openide.LifecycleManager.getDefault().saveAll() might make this class obsolete.

commit.message: [NETBEANS-4294] Included licenseinfo for binary image file
[NETBEANS-4294] Removed a generated file and menu item registration (user still can add it to the toolbar if wanted)
[NETBEANS-4294] Included a 24x24 icon and removed unused import

nodes.bodyText: I have not seen this auto_save24.png used. If it is not used, It should be removed.

nodes.bodyText:
Shall be declared as a static final constant with //NOI18N at the end.
Also it could be annotated with @staticResource
If the layer file become empty, let's get rid of it.
nodes.diffHunk:

+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

I think is.eager=true would be recommended here.
Otherwise it would be a normal module which requires to be enabled by the user.

commit.message: [NETBEANS-4294] . Reduzed the library version to make possible to install in IDE older versions

nodes.bodyText:
Shall this be a constant? Anyway it is probably shall be false at first.
Remember people not using this module any more as they wished to use it. It is loaded by default.
We can enable autosave to be turned on  by default after circulating this function with the IDE for a while.Also probably autosave on focus lost should be enabled by default then instead of the timed save.

commit.message: [NETBEANS-4294] Changed this feature to be disabled by default and fixed the property name
